org.apache.ignite.cache.store.cassandra.persistence

Class PojoField

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.cache.store.cassandra.persistence.PojoField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PojoKeyField, PojoValueField

    public abstract class PojoField
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Descriptor for particular field in a POJO object, specifying how this field should be written to or loaded from Cassandra.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Creates instance of PojoField from its property descriptor.

      • getValueFromObject

        public Object getValueFromObject(Object obj,
                        Serializer serializer)
        Gets field value as an object having Cassandra compatible type. This it could be stored directly into Cassandra without any conversions.
        Parameters:
        obj - Object instance.
        serializer - Serializer to use.
        Returns:
        Object to store in Cassandra table column.

      • setValueFromRow

        public void setValueFromRow(com.datastax.driver.core.Row row,
                   Object obj,
                   Serializer serializer)
        Sets object field value from a Row returned by Cassandra CQL statement.
        Parameters:
        row - Row
        obj - object which field should be populated from Row
        serializer - Serializer to use.
